title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: N. R.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and black ink, graphite on cream illustration board
markings: On verso, upside down, a Canson and Montgolfier label (Carson Lavie B).
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: N. R.; upper right corner: 927
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Monogram composed of a solid black "R" above a solid black "N" separated by a thin black zig-zag line.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: N. R.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black ink, brush and black ink, graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-98.
